cleaned_text: There is a reason why homeopathy has survived and even thrived for centuries: It just works! The field of homeopathic medicine has been developed since the mid 1700s by physicians performing clinical research in their medical practices and documenting their findings. These seasoned physicians recorded patient's symptoms and noted how they responded to very small dilution of a natural substance such as plant, animal or mineral. Thus, finding a person's correct homeopathic remedy can be achieved by identifying patterns in a person's symptoms and matching them to a remedy. Dr.Hardy, in particular, appreciates this modality of medicine because it is gentle and very effective. Children respond particularly well to homeopathic remedies, which puts many parents' minds at ease since homeopathy is a very safe treatment option.
